name: Ichor Holdings, Ltd.
description: Ichor Holdings, Ltd. is a leading provider of fluid delivery systems and components for the semiconductor industry. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in Fremont, California, Ichor specializes in the design and manufacture of advanced solutions that enable the production of high-performance semiconductors. The company's innovative products include gas and chemical delivery systems, as well as other critical components that support the manufacturing processes of semiconductor fabrication facilities. With a strong focus on research and development, Ichor is committed to providing cutting-edge technology that enhances the efficiency and performance of semiconductor manufacturing. The company serves a diverse customer base that includes leading semiconductor manufacturers worldwide, contributing to the ever-evolving landscape of electronics and technology. Ichor's mission is to leverage its engineering expertise and industry knowledge to deliver high-quality products that meet the demanding needs of its customers, while also advancing the future of semiconductor technology. The company aims to play a pivotal role in the growth of the semiconductor industry, which is essential for powering a wide range of electronic devices and systems in today's connected world.

seo.meta_title: Ichor Holdings, Ltd. | Semiconductor Fluid Delivery Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Ichor Holdings, Ltd., a leader in fluid delivery systems for semiconductor manufacturing. Learn about our innovative technologies and commitment to quality.

faq.question: What does Ichor Holdings specialize in?
faq.answer: Ichor Holdings specializes in fluid delivery systems and components for the semiconductor industry.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Ichor Holdings?
faq.answer: Jeffrey M. Andreson is the CEO of Ichor Holdings, Ltd.

faq.question: Where is Ichor Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: Ichor Holdings is headquartered in Fremont, California, USA.

faq.question: What are Ichor's main products?
faq.answer: Ichor's main products include gas and chemical delivery systems, vacuum systems, and pressure regulators.
